entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
